## üìã Token Regeneration Checklist

### Phase 1: Preparation (5 minutes)
- [ ] Open [Graph API Explorer](https://developers.facebook.com/tools/explorer/)
- [ ] Log in with admin account for Untrapd Hub page
- [ ] Locate your Meta App: "UNTRAPD Hub Social Media Automation"

### Phase 2: Instagram Token (10 minutes)
- [ ] Select your app in Graph API Explorer
- [ ] Add required permissions:
  - [ ] `instagram_basic`
  - [ ] `instagram_content_publish`
  - [ ] `instagram_manage_insights`
  - [ ] `pages_show_list`
- [ ] Generate short-lived token
- [ ] Exchange for long-lived token (60 days)
- [ ] Copy new token to notepad

### Phase 3: Facebook Token (10 minutes)
- [ ] Switch to Untrapd Hub page in Graph API Explorer
- [ ] Add required permissions:
  - [ ] `pages_manage_posts`
  - [ ] `pages_read_engagement`
  - [ ] `pages_show_list`
- [ ] Generate short-lived token
- [ ] Exchange for long-lived token (60 days)
- [ ] Copy new token to notepad

### Phase 4: Update & Validate (5 minutes)
- [ ] Update `.env` file with new tokens
- [ ] Run validation: `node validate-meta-apis.js`
- [ ] Verify both APIs show ‚úÖ READY status
- [ ] Set calendar reminder for token refresh in 50 days

**Total Time**: ~30 minutes

## üîê Security Checklist

### Current Security Status
- ‚úÖ Tokens stored in `.env` file (not in git)
- ‚úÖ `.gitignore` configured to exclude `.env`
- ‚úÖ No tokens exposed in code repositories
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Tokens need rotation (currently expired)

### Security Best Practices
- [ ] Tokens rotated every 60 days
- [ ] Calendar reminder set for next rotation
- [ ] Backup tokens stored securely (password manager)
- [ ] Access logs monitored for unusual activity
- [ ] Rate limiting implemented in scripts

## üöÄ Next Steps (Priority Order)

### üî¥ IMMEDIATE (Today)
1. **Regenerate Tokens** (30 minutes)
   - Follow TOKEN_REGENERATION_GUIDE.md

   - Get 60-day long-lived tokens

2. **Update .env File** (2 minutes)
   ```bash
   INSTAGRAM_ACCESS_TOKEN=new_token_here
   FACEBOOK_PAGE_TOKEN=new_token_here
   ```

3. **Validate Tokens** (2 minutes)
   ```bash
   node validate-meta-apis.js
   ```

   node finderr-facebook-launch.js
